resources.string: OverSurge is an app that gives you player stats, news, patch notes, and Overwatch League info. Any player entered must have a public profile and usernames are cap sensitive.
You can save your account and it will be displayed on the home page for easy access. This is optional and can be changed at any time.
This user has a private profile
Your Blizzard account has not been entered. Go to "Settings" and enter your username and tag"
Your account is private. For your stats to show, switch to public profile.
The Blizzard account that you entered does not exist. Please fix it in "Settings" or check your internet connection
No match data is currently available
Click to view more OWL details
(Your saved accounts will appear here. Click on a player icon to view their details. Drag and drop to organize list.)
